article_title: U.K. Commodities Hedge Fund Clive Capital Closing
article_text:
Clive Capital, one of the world's largest commodities hedge funds, is shutting down, the latest casualty of investors' retreat from raw-materials markets.

In a letter, the fund said it would close at the end of the month, returning about $1 billion to investors due to the "limited, suitable opportunities" to profit from wagers based on supply and demand. A spokeswoman for the firm declined to comment further.

...

twitter.description: Clive Capital, a commodities hedge-fund firm based in London, is closing after an extended period of poor performance and dwindling assets under management.

article_metadata.author: Giles Turner
article_metadata.article.origheadline: U.K. Commodities Hedge Fund Clive Capital Closing

article_summary:
Clive Capital, one of the world's largest commodities hedge funds, is shutting down, the latest casualty of investors' retreat from raw-materials markets.
A spokeswoman for the firm declined to comment further.
In a letter, the fund said it would close at the end of the month, returning about $1 billion to investors due to the "limited, suitable opportunities" to profit from wagers based on supply and demand.
